member.name: T:NSwag.AspNetCore.JsonExceptionFilterAttribute
member.summary: Handles thrown exceptions from action methods and serializes them with the correct HTTP status code.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:NSwag.AspNetCore.JsonExceptionFilterAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: If set to true the serializer hides stack trace (i.e. sets the StackTrace to 'HIDDEN').

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: If set to true the serializer hides stack trace (i.e. sets the StackTrace to 'HIDDEN').
The namespaces and assemblies to search for exception types.

member.summary: Occurs after the action method is invoked.

member.summary: The settings for UseSwagger.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerOwinSettings.MiddlewareBasePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the OWIN base path (when mapped via app.MapOwinPath()) (must start with '/').

member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger URL route (must start with '/').

member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger post process action.

member.summary: The settings for UseSwaggerUi.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiOwinSettings.SwaggerUiRoute
member.summary: Gets or sets the swagger UI route (must start with '/').

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Swagger specification should be validated.
